remarks: The units of ` Z/nZ ` are the integers coprime to the base. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 18-Apr-2016.)
statement:
znchr.y $e |- Y = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
znunit.u $e |- U = ( Unit ` Y ) $.
znunit.l $e |- L = ( ZRHom ` Y ) $.
znunit $p |- ( ( N e. NN0 /\ A e. ZZ ) -> ( ( L ` A ) e. U <-> ( A gcd N ) = 1 ) ) $.
